definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: Objection To observe analgesic effect of Angelica oil on mouse dysmenorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察研究當歸油對小鼠痛經的鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: Externally used Dan Gui is very versatile; if you are wanting mostly the invigorating properties you should use the TAIL of the herb, or Dang Gui Wei.
sentences.chinese: 如果主要需要滋補的話，可以使用當歸的尾部。

sentences.english: Furthermore, Danggui Buxue Tang also can promote the production of blood and improve angiogenesis .
sentences.chinese: 當歸補血湯還具有促進造血和血管生成作用。

sentences.english: For example, Dang Gui is found in balms to help with burns and such.
sentences.chinese: 例如，燒傷等所用的鎮痛軟膏中就含有當歸。

sentences.english: Chinese angelica parenteral solution was replaced by normal saline in control group.
sentences.chinese: 對照組給予生理鹽水代替當歸注射液治療。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Angelica injection can reduce GE ototoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 結論當歸注射液能降低GE的耳毒性。

sentences.english: Aim To study the anti-dysmenorrhea effect of the essential oil from Angelica sinensis Diels.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究當歸精油治療痛經的藥理作用。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the antioxidation activities of two Chinese herbs, polygonum multiflorum and Angelica sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究生首烏和當歸兩種中藥的抗氧化活性。

sentences.english: As an example, study of DangGui verified the predicting abililty of the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 以中藥當歸爲實例對該方法進行應用研究。

sentences.english: Boss will add in the angelica based on the customers' needs.
sentences.chinese: 老闆是應顧客的需要而加入當歸。

sentences.english: Ultrasonography and extracting a short time, Angelica in the basic ferulic acid can be extracted completely.
sentences.chinese: 且超聲提取時間短，當歸中的阿魏酸基本能提取完全。

sentences.english: RESULTS The contents of components were changed after Angelica sinensis(Oliv. )Diels was processed by different methods.
sentences.chinese: 結果當歸經不同方法炮製後，其所含成分發生了變化。

sentences.english: What's more, Dong Quai is a mild tranquilliser and helps relieve stress and pressure.
sentences.chinese: 當歸亦具有溫和的鎮靜效果，有助緩解緊張及壓力。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the inner quality of ultra micro-powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討當歸超微細粉的內在質量。

definition: poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
four-substance decoction (si wu tang), tonic formula used in Chinese medicine
donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
